product_name: Keen Newport H2 Sandals - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The Keen Newport H2 Sandals are built for fun in the water, and feature Keen patented rubber toe guards to protect toes while crossing rocky streams and rivers. Water-friendly and lightweight polyester webbing uppers wash easily; pull loops facilitate easy on-and-off. Uppers are laced with elastic cord and secure with quicklocks for a comfortable, easily adjustable fit. Patented rubber toe guards protect feet from scuffs, bumps and uneven terrain. Nylon mesh linings and anatomically shaped footbeds feature an antimicrobial treatment to help deter odor development. Compression-molded EVA midsoles offer lightweight cushioning and flexibility for all-day comfort. Nonmarking rubber outsoles on the Keen Newport H2 Sandals feature multidirectional lugs with razor siping for improved traction on wet surfaces. Closeout.
short_description: The Keen Newport H2 Sandals are built for fun in the water, and feature Keen patented rubber toe guards to protect toes while crossing rocky streams and rivers.
